medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric pain lasting for 1 day, associated with nausea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Intermittent epigastric pain for the past few months, starting as brief episodes lasting a few minutes, then becoming longer. The patient experienced three similar episodes in the past two months that resolved spontaneously. Today's pain is longer lasting, worsened by nausea and dry heaves.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Atrial fibrillation, impaired glucose intolerance, hyperlipidemia, hiatal hernia, GERD, treated H. Pylori, basal cell carcinoma, contracture of right finger, gout, history of skull fracture.
medical_history.family_history: Mother with breast cancer, father with abdominal cancer.
